code: import React from"react";import ScrollView from"react-native-web/dist/exports/ScrollView";import View from"react-native-web/dist/exports/View";import{Button,Icon,Screen,Text}from"../../components";import{colors,spacing}from"../../theme";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function ErrorDetails(props){return _jsxs(Screen,{preset:"fixed",safeAreaEdges:["top","bottom"],contentContainerStyle:$contentContainer,children:[_jsxs(View,{style:$topSection,children:[_jsx(Icon,{icon:"ladybug",size:64}),_jsx(Text,{style:$heading,preset:"subheading",tx:"errorScreen.title"}),_jsx(Text,{tx:"errorScreen.friendlySubtitle"})]}),_jsxs(ScrollView,{style:$errorSection,contentContainerStyle:$errorSectionContentContainer,children:[_jsx(Text,{style:$errorContent,weight:"bold",text:(""+props.error).trim()}),_jsx(Text,{selectable:true,style:$errorBacktrace,text:(""+props.errorInfo.componentStack).trim()})]}),_jsx(Button,{preset:"reversed",style:$resetButton,onPress:props.onReset,tx:"errorScreen.reset"})]});}var $contentContainer={alignItems:"center",paddingHorizontal:spacing.lg,paddingTop:spacing.xl,flex:1};var $topSection={flex:1,alignItems:"center"};var $heading={color:colors.error,marginBottom:spacing.md};var $errorSection={flex:2,backgroundColor:colors.separator,marginVertical:spacing.md,borderRadius:6};var $errorSectionContentContainer={padding:spacing.md};var $errorContent={color:colors.error};var $errorBacktrace={marginTop:spacing.md,color:colors.textDim};var $resetButton={backgroundColor:colors.error,paddingHorizontal:spacing.xxl};
